Articles.Content:
The SR-71 was a Recon plane designed in 1960's.

It holds the record for fastest air breathing manned aircraft with speeds of mach 3+.

This aircraft was retired in 1990.

This craft in game is really fast if you actually tested you will see or you can see the pictures.

This isn't really 99.9% replication some parts are off, but if you came here to see a 100% blackbird you should go check Eorin out

Stats:

Parts 122

Speed 200-1075 m/s (200 on takeoff & low alt)(1075 m/s at 16-17 km)(3870 km/h) Which actually beats the real world record.

Download

I do love a good craft replica. Nicely done A shame you can't really replicate the all-black paintjob and keep it stock, but other than that, it's quite impressive how close you got.

Yes he is, glad I hired him for KODI. To bad I have to wait till i get home from school to see it then ill probably update my one from be fore 0.25.
